          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com ho puc fer per recordar paraules difícils en anglès?</string>
            <string language="en">How can I remember difficult words in English?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie kann ich an schwierige Wörter auf englisch 
mich erinnern?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment est-ce que je peux me rappeler des mots 
difficiles en anglais ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como posso eu recordar palavras difíceis em 
inglês?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come posso ricordarsi delle parole difficili in 
inglese?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς μπορώ να θυμηθώ τις δύσκολες λέξεις στα αγγλικά;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) en la qual s'exposen alguns procediments per aprendre vocabulari en anglès.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) with ideas for learning English vocabulary.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="es">traducción</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) mit Ideen für 
das Lernen des englischen Wortschatzes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) avec des idées pour 
apprendre le vocabulaire anglais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) com idéias aprendendo o 
vocabulário inglês.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) con le idee per imparare il 
vocabolario inglese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) με τις ιδέες για την εκμάθηση
του αγγλικού λεξιλογίου.</string>
